text: Orz, orz, or ORZ may refer to: * orz, a posture emoticon representing a kneeling, bowing, or comically fallen over person * Orz, a race in the fictional Star Control universe * Ormu language of Papua (ISO 639-3 code) * Orange Walk Airport, Belize (IATA code) ==See also== *OCZ, a brand of solid- state drives
title: Orz
